rooms.description: Grand entrance hall with elegant Art Deco finishes and Vastu-aligned entryway.
Spacious living room featuring geometric patterns and luxury decor in keeping with Art Deco style, aligned with Vastu principles for family gatherings.
Open-plan dining area integrated with the living space, designed to enhance social interaction and ensure Vastu harmony.
Functional kitchen incorporating modern appliances with Art Deco elements, placed in the north-eastern corner to harness positive energy according to Vastu.
Guest bedroom with a private ensuite bathroom ensuring privacy and convenience, designed with symmetry for Vastu balance.
Master bedroom with walk-in closet and attached en-suite bathroom; positioned in the south-western corner to enhance personal energy as per Vastu.
Second bedroom for additional privacy, also with sufficient space and natural lighting in compliance with Vastu guidelines.
Multi-functional study area that can serve as a home office, integrating modern design elements while remaining in harmony with Vastu principles.
Additional bathroom ensuring functional layout and proper drainage as per Indian building norms and Vastu considerations.

openings.description: Large, elegant front door with Art Deco detailing in the north-facing wall to maximize positive energy.
Floor-to-ceiling windows on the south and east walls for natural light and ventilation, designed in line with Vastu.
Optimized window placements for adequate daylighting in the kitchen area.
Balcony extending from the living room to provide outdoor space and fresh air, designed with Art Deco railings.
Service entrance for deliveries and utilities, discretely located to maintain the aesthetic appeal of the property.

rooms.description: Master bedroom extension on the first floor with an expansive ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet.
Additional bedroom ensuring ample personal space in accordance with Vastu alignment for family members.
Enhanced study area on the upper level, offering a quiet retreat and inspiring ambiance in line with Art Deco decor.
Convertible open space for yoga or exercise that also serves as an informal lounge area, ensuring natural light and airflow in accordance with Vastu.
Additional bathroom to complement the master bedroom ensuite for added convenience.

openings.description: Strategically placed windows throughout the upper floor to enhance natural lighting and maintain balance as per Vastu.
Balcony on the first floor providing outdoor access with a view, designed with decorative railings in Art Deco style.

rooms.description: Luxury swimming pool area with adjoining lounge spaces, designed to offer privacy and leisure in a serene setting.
Open rooftop lounge for family gatherings and relaxation, featuring Art Deco furniture and Vastu-aligned layout.

openings.description: Elevated access point to the roof garden, ensuring safe and discreet movement between levels.
Extended balcony with integrated seating areas for enjoying panoramic views while adhering to safety norms.
